TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionItemCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a DesignerActionItemCollection and populate it to form a smart tag list. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
[!CODE [System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7)]
